channel.title: ContionScape - VERY VERY NEW SERVER - PLEASE TEST IT RIGHT NOW
channel.description:
[b][size=36pt]ContionScape[/size][/b] ContionScape is a very very new server. I would be glad if someone could test or join it. Thanks if you would :D, if you can please do it now.
I am online waiting right now for someone to come :D
I am looking for admins, you can be one, just come in and we will chat!
This will be just like old RuneScape, but no shops, everything will be have to be made by yourself and no G.E. of course, you have to talk! ;) Food will have to be made ingredient by ingredient or just fished and cooked. Armor and other things will have to be smithed. So players kinda have the right to choose their own price ;) EXP Rate will be same as real RuneScape. (Yeah, all this is something like Hardcore Ironman Mode)
[size=24pt][b]List[/b][/size] (those who arent underlined (not completed yet) idk how to do :confused: if you can please help me) [s]Remove shops[/s] [s]Change EXP Rate to real RS[/s] [s]Make so you start with no items[/s] [s]Remove shop NPCs[/s] Remove teleports (on ground) Make so teleports cost runes for real Change teleports to real teleports like those in real RS Make so quests wouldn't be automatically completed
[b]SERVER WILL BE ONLINE EVERYDAY UNTIL AROUND GMT 15,30, THEN IT WILL GO BACK ONLINE THE NEXT DAY IN AROUND 6, 30 AM, EXCEPT OFFLINE SATURDAY, SUNDAY[/b]
Server is currently... ONLINE
DOWNLOAD HERE: [url=http://www.filedropper.com/contionscape_1]http://www.filedropper.com/contionscape_1[/url]
PLEASE TEST IT WILL ANYONE BE SO KIND TO TEST IT U WIL BE ADMIN PLEASE I HAVE BEEN WAITING 2 DAYS IM CRYING IRL PLEASEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
